scripts.kill-all: npm run kill-dev && npm run kill-prod
scripts.dev: npm run kill-dev && npm run clear-logs-dev && sleep 1 && npx next dev -p 3009
scripts.dev-bg: npm run kill-dev && npm run clear-logs-dev && sleep 1 && nohup npx next dev -p 3009 > logs/dev/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log 2>&1 &
scripts.start: npm run kill-prod && npm run clear-logs-prod && sleep 1 && npx next start -p 3010
scripts.start-bg: npm run kill-prod && npm run clear-logs-prod && sleep 1 && nohup npx next start -p 3010 > logs/prod/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log 2>&1 &
scripts.deploy: npm run kill-all && npm run clear-logs-prod && sleep 1 && npx next build && npx next start -p 3010
scripts.deploy-bg: npm run kill-all && npm run clear-logs-prod && sleep 1 && nohup bash -c 'npx next build && npx next start -p 3010' > logs/prod/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log 2>&1 &
scripts.port-check: echo '3009 (dev): ' && (fuser 3009/tcp && echo 'IN USE') || echo 'FREE' && echo '3010 (prod): ' && (fuser 3010/tcp && echo 'IN USE') || echo 'FREE'
scripts.status: echo '=== DEV LOG STATUS ===' && grep 'Ready' logs/dev/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log || echo 'No Ready status in dev log' && echo '=== PROD LOG STATUS ===' && grep 'Ready' logs/prod/$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log || echo 'No Ready status in prod log' && echo '=== PORT STATUS ===' && echo '3009 (dev): ' && (fuser 3009/tcp && echo 'IN USE') || echo 'FREE' && echo '3010 (prod): ' && (fuser 3010/tcp && echo 'IN USE') || echo 'FREE'
